title: Wall Street Breakfast July 28: Meta Tackling the Downturn; Spirit and JetBlue Agreement
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Spirit Airlines agrees on $3.8B buyout from JetBlue. Meta earnings call: Tackling the downturn. Manchin reaches surprise deal with Schumer on energy, healthcare package. Stock futures slip after Fed rally, key GDP report on tap. House Democrats to propose stock trading ban in August - report. Catch today’s WSB article here.
